verses.roman:
ataeva śrī-kṛṣṇa-caitanya gosāñi
sarva avatāra-līlā kari' sabāre dekhāi

synonyms: ataeva—therefore; śrī-kṛṣṇa-caitanya—Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; gosāñi—the Lord; sarva—all; avatāra-līlā—the pastimes of different incarnations; kari'-exhibiting; sabāre—to everyone; dekhāi—He showed.
translation: Therefore Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu has exhibited to everyone all the pastimes of all the various incarnations.
